context:
This is a ferry domain, where the task is to transport cars from their start to their goal locations, using a ferry. Each location is accessible by ferry from each other location. The cars can be debarked or boarded, and the ferry can carry only one car at a time. 
There are 2 locations and 20 cars, numbered consecutively. 
Currently, the ferry is at l0, with the car c2 on board. The cars are at locations as follows: c0, c3, c15, c10, c8, c6, and c9 are at l0; c18, c17, c16, c4, c19, c5, c13, c7, c1, c12, c14, and c11 are at l1. The available actions are: (sail ?from ?to) - travel by sea from location ?from to location ?to, (board ?car ?loc) - load the car ?car at location ?loc on to the ferry, and (debark ?car ?loc) - unload the car ?car from the ferry to location ?loc.
question: Generate the list of all ground actions that are applicable in this state.
PDDL_domain:
(define (domain ferry)
    (:requirements :strips :typing)
    (:types car location - object)
    (:predicates (at ?c - car ?l - location)  (at-ferry ?l - location)  (empty-ferry) (not-eq ?x ?y)  (on ?c - car))
    (:action board
        :parameters (?car - car ?loc - location)
        :precondition (and (at ?car ?loc) (at-ferry ?loc) (empty-ferry))
        :effect (and (on ?car) (not (at ?car ?loc)) (not (empty-ferry)))
    )
     (:action debark
        :parameters (?car - car ?loc - location)
        :precondition (and (on ?car) (at-ferry ?loc))
        :effect (and (at ?car ?loc) (empty-ferry) (not (on ?car)))
    )
     (:action sail
        :parameters (?from - location ?to - location)
        :precondition (and (not-eq ?from ?to) (at-ferry ?from))
        :effect (and (at-ferry ?to) (not (at-ferry ?from)))
    )
)
PDDL_problem:
(define (problem ferry-l2-c20)
    (:domain ferry)
    (:requirements :strips :typing)
    (:objects c0 c1 c10 c11 c12 c13 c14 c15 c16 c17 c18 c19 c2 c3 c4 c5 c6 c7 c8 c9 - car l0 l1 - location)
    (:init (at c0 l0) (at c1 l1) (at c10 l0) (at c11 l1) (at c12 l1) (at c13 l1) (at c14 l1) (at c15 l0) (at c16 l1) (at c17 l1) (at c18 l1) (at c19 l1) (at c3 l0) (at c4 l1) (at c5 l1) (at c6 l0) (at c7 l1) (at c8 l0) (at c9 l0) (at-ferry l0) (not-eq l0 l1) (not-eq l1 l0) (on c2))
    (:goal (and (at c0 l0) (at c1 l1) (at c2 l1) (at c3 l0) (at c4 l1) (at c5 l1) (at c6 l1) (at c7 l1) (at c8 l1) (at c9 l0) (at c10 l0) (at c11 l1) (at c12 l1) (at c13 l0) (at c14 l1) (at c15 l0) (at c16 l1) (at c17 l1) (at c18 l1) (at c19 l1)))
)
